title: Uko AidVault Ikora
subtitle: Uko bikorwa mu buryo bworoshye kandi busobanutse, buhindura amafaranga yawe ku ngaruka zifatika. Dore byose ugomba kumenya ku kuzigama ufite intego.
processDesc: Uhereye ku kwiyandikisha kugeza ku ngaruka—dore urugendo rwawe muri AidVault

steps.title: Fungura Konti Yawe
steps.description: Iyandikishe mu minota mike ukoresheje imeri yawe gusa. Nta kugenzura credit, nta mafaranga y’ibanga. Urugendo rwawe rwo kuzigama ufite intego rutangira hano.

steps.title: Ongeramo Amafaranga muri Vault Yawe
steps.description: Shyiramo amafaranga igihe icyo ari cyo cyose ushaka. Nta n’aho hasi—tangira n’ayo wiyumvamo neza hanyuma ubyubake buhoro buhoro.

steps.title: Reba Amafaranga Yawe Akura
steps.description: Kurikirana iterambere ryawe kuri dashboard yawe. Reba umubare w’amafaranga yawe ukura kandi urebe uko ingaruka yawe ishobora kwiyongera mu gihe nyacyo.

steps.title: Tanga 20% mu Burezi
steps.description: Nyuma y’amezi 6, uraba ushoboye gutanga inkunga. 20% by’amafaranga yawe ajya mu gutanga ibikoresho by’ishuri n’ibikoresho by’uburezi.

steps.title: Reba Ingaruka Zawe & Ongera
steps.description: Uhabwa amakuru ku buryo inkunga yawe yafashije. Hanyuma utangire icyiciro gishya cyo kuzigama ukomeze gutanga impinduka.

journeySubtitle: Reba Ingaruka Zawe Zikura Mu Gihe
journeyDesc: Buri gihe wongeramo amafaranga muri vault yawe, nturi kuzigama gusa ku nyungu zawe—uri gushora mu hazaza h’umwana. Dore uko urugendo rwawe rumeze:
journeyFeatures: Kureba umubare w’amafaranga mu gihe nyacyo
Kureba iterambere mu ntego yawe yo gutanga inkunga
Igihe gisigaye kugira ngo ube ushobora gutanga inkunga
daysUntilEligible: Hasigaye iminsi {{days}} mbere yo gushobora gutanga inkunga
faqDesc: Byose ugomba kumenya ku kuzigama no gutanga inkunga muri AidVault

faqs.question: Kuki amezi 6?
faqs.answer: Igihe cy’amezi 6 kigufasha gushyiraho umuco w’ukuzigama ufite icyo ugeraho mu gihe wongera amafaranga ahagije kugira ngo ugaragaze impinduka zifatika. Bituma kandi dutanga inkunga mu buryo bwagutse kandi butunganye, bigabanya amafaranga y’ubuyobozi kandi bigafasha ko inkunga nyinshi zigera ku bana bayikeneye.

faqs.question: Kuki 20%?
faqs.answer: Icyiyemezo cya 20% cyateguwe kugira ngo kibe gifite ingaruka kandi gishoboke. Bigufasha kuzigama ku ntego zawe kandi utanga umusanzu ukomeye mu burezi. Abakoresha benshi basanga ubu buryo bubaha imbaraga—uri kubaka ejo hawe uri gushora mu hazaza h’undi muntu.

faqs.question: Inkunga yanjye igera hehe?
faqs.answer: 100% by’inkunga yawe ijya mu bikoresho by’ishuri no mu bikoresho by’uburezi by’abana bayikeneye. Dukorana n’amashuri n’imiryango yemewe mu bihugu birenga 15. Buri nkunga irakurikiranwa, kandi uzajya uhabwa amakuru ku ngaruka z’inkunga yawe.

faqs.question: Nshobora gutanga arenze 20%?
faqs.answer: Yego rwose! Iyo ugeze ku ntego y’amezi 6, ushobora guhitamo gutanga hagati ya 20% kugeza kuri 100% by’amafaranga yawe. Abakoresha benshi bahisemo gutanga arenze igihe babishoboye, kandi buri mafaranga y’inyongera agira ingaruka nini.

faqs.question: Nshobora gusohora amafaranga yanjye?
faqs.answer: Yego, amafaranga yawe ni ayawe igihe cyose. Ariko turagushishikariza kurangiza icyiciro cy’amezi 6 kugira ngo wongere ingaruka yawe. Niba ukeneye gusohora mbere y’igihe, urashobora kubikora, ariko icyiyemezo cya 20% cyakurikizwa ku byiciro by’igihe kizaza.

faqs.question: Amafaranga yanjye arizewe?
faqs.answer: Amafaranga yawe arinzwe hakoreshejwe uburinzi bwa banki kandi abikwa muri konti zemewe. Dukoresha uburyo bugezweho bwo kurinda umutekano harimo 256-bit SSL encryption na two-factor authentication kurinda konti yawe n’amafaranga yawe.

startJourneyDesc: Injira mu bihumbi by’abazigama bari guhindura ubuzima bw’abana mu gihe bubaka ejo hazaza habo bwite.
